# File lib/bundler/cli.rb, line 311
    def exec(*)
      ARGV.delete("exec")

      Bundler.setup

      begin
        # Run
        Kernel.exec(*ARGV)
      rescue Errno::EACCES
        Bundler.ui.error "bundler: not executable: #{ARGV.first}"
        exit 126
      rescue Errno::ENOENT
        Bundler.ui.error "bundler: command not found: #{ARGV.first}"
        Bundler.ui.warn  "Install missing gem binaries with `bundle install`"
        exit 127
      end
    end
